messages.title: SIX reasons to re-elect Chris PHILP
messages.content: 1. Keep an effective local MP 2. 100+ more Police for Croydon 3. Protect the NHS & Schools 4. Fight Labour’s Planning Disaster 5. END the BREXIT UNCERTAINTY 6. A strong economy

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £350m to help fix Brighton Mainline problems, £21m for a new A&E at Croydon Hospital (Mayday), Morning opening hours at Purley Hospital GP Hub, Getting the Purley Skyscraper "Called in" to put a stop to it, Secured a one third cut in Business Rates for small shops
Chris has delivered 100 extra police officers and is promised 100 more.
Record NHS spending, more NHS services in the local area, cash for more school places
Opposition to the 15 storey tower blocks in Purley town centre
Helped drag a deal through Parliament and has the skills to get Brexit done, giving us the certainty to take advantage of new trade opportunities.
Support for businesses in order to create jobs and prosperity. Driving investment to the local area.

endorsements.endorsement: When Purley businesses faced losing Business Rates Relief, Chris was instrumental in persuading the Chancellor to keep this lifeline for small shops in our area. As usual, he worked tirelessly behind the scenes to achieve this.

Chris has been a great support to me and my community project - Ballers Club - ever since we first met in 2017. He has supported my successful Knife Crime Community Fund application to the Home Office, with I'm very grateful for.
There are no words to thank Chris enough for what he has done for my family and me.
We'd like to say thank you to Chris Philp for his help when our housing association tried to build on our homes and move us out.
Thank you so much again for all your support
I have known Chris well for some time - he visited our business two years ago when our residents and staff were facing eviction by the Council.
We have seen the passion Chris has in getting things done.
Chris stood with us twice against 2 developers who wanted to demolish our properties

quotes.text: I just wanted to thank Chris for his help with the council. All the residents, without exception, praise him for the attention he has given our rehousing situation.
quotes.source: Elizabeth Lowe, Local resident, South Croydon

quotes.text: Chris has campaigned for our factories to remain here. I ask for support with our redevelopment twice - Chris helped both times.
